creator: Smart Quiz Apps
descriptionHtml:
Download “Art Quiz Questions And Answers” and show how how much you know about world famous artists and most famous paintings. Take an exciting virtual tour of the most beautiful galleries around the world! Learn a variety of interesting facts about the world of art from the Renaissance to the modern times. Can you “guess the painting”, “guess the name of artist” or answer other interesting art trivia questions? Step into the world of amazing visual arts and explore all the best painting in the world and most talented artists. Discover all the artistic hidden treasures and most stunning paintings, from old masters like Michelangelo and Leonardo Da Vinci to modern ones like Picasso and Andy Warhol.

🎨 Art Quiz Questions And Answers 🎨 features:

💡 Two game modes available:
* Endless - play for hours as long as you give correct answers to free quiz questions. The game ends as soon as you give 3 wrong answers.
* Time - prolong your playing time as long as you give correct answers!

💡 Four different types of questions:

* Multiple Choice - choose the correct out of four offered answers;
* Entry - unscramble letters to get an answer;
* Scratch photo quiz - guess pictures;
* Blur - sharpen the blurred image and type in the correct answer.

Art history quiz questions and answers on most famous paintings and artists!

Keep your brain active and your memory sharp! Try to answer all the hard questions and put your artistic IQ to a test. Fun art games to play are the best way for adults and kids to learn a lot about most famous painters and their paintings. Can you pass the ultimate art test of knowledge – one of the top free quizzes with gk quiz questions on famous art pieces? This intelligent game does not test your intelligence but your education level and general culture. Choose one of the most educational and fun trivia quizzes for kids and adults to get to know the artistic world. You can also test art knowledge of your friends or colleagues with this amazing name the painting quiz and guess the artist picture quiz.

Guess the artist and name that painting!

Download one of the best art quiz apps and start the ultimate artist test right now! Are you a real connoisseur or are you just an artsy amateur? Quiz yourself with the best artist and painting quiz! Answer a variety of classic or modern art quiz questions! This awesome game is all you need in one smart app. Start this trivial but tricky quiz game to see how well your really know the worlds of arts, painters, museums and galleries.
Art history test, contemporary art quiz and guess the artist quiz 2020.

Test your general knowledge in art and become the master of the name the artist quiz game! With this smart quiz game you can cover all the major periods from Renaissance to Contemporary Art and find out a lot of fun facts. For many people, this is the impossible quiz challenge. Get the most useful visual arts app and famous artist quiz with pop culture quiz questions. Test your erudition and your general knowledge with one of the most fun art trivia quizzes for adults and children. Explore all the magnificent “pieces of art” and learn about modern art as well. Download Art Quiz Questions And Answers and prove you are a real art expert!
descriptionShort: Art trivia questions and answers about famous artists and famous paintings.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for playing our quiz!
From time to time we do some maintenance so that our quizzes can run as smoothly as possible.
